languages.text: Whenever the wielder parries an attack or hits 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's ranged area attack first time per round, this attack does not count toward the attack limit per turn.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder parries an attack or hits 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's ranged area attack first time per round, this attack does not count toward the attack limit per turn.

languages.text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку или попадает по 2 или более врагам выстрелом из этого дробовика по области, он может совершить +1 атаку дополнительно до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder parries an attack or hits 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's ranged area attack, this shotgun next attack does not count toward the attack limit per turn.

When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, bir saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturduğunda{/g} veya bu pompalının {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli alan saldırısıyla{/g} 2 veya daha fazla düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} +1 saldırı hakkı kazanır. Bu hak, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında sıfırlanır. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, bir saldırıyı savuşturduğunda veya bu pompalının menzilli alan saldırısıyla 2 veya daha fazla düşmanı vurduğunda +1 saldırı hakkı kazanır. Bu hak, bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında sıfırlanır. Etki üst üste birikmez.

Kullanan kişi, bir saldırıyı savuşturduğunda veya bu pompalının menzilli alan saldırısıyla 2 veya daha fazla düşmanı vurduğunda +1 saldırı hakkı kazanır. Bu hak, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında sıfırlanır. Etki üst üste birikmez.

languages.text: Cuando el portador realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} con éxito o {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a 2 enemigos o más con el {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataque de área a distancia{/g} de esta escopeta, gana +1 ataque hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador realiza una parada con éxito o impacta a 2 enemigos o más con el ataque de área a distancia de esta escopeta, gana +1 ataque hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 当装备者使用这把霰弹枪{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击，或使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}至少2名敌人时，装备者可以额外攻击一次。此效果不可叠加，持续至装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前。
languages.original_text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用这把霰弹枪招架攻击，或使用远程范围攻击命中至少2名敌人时，装备者可以额外攻击一次。此效果不可叠加，持续至装备者下个回合开始前。

languages.text: Quand l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque ou {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} au moins 2 ennemis avec l'{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaque de zone à distance{/g} de ce fusil à pompe, il gagne +1 attaque jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'utilisateur pare une attaque ou touche au moins 2 ennemis avec l'attaque de zone à distance de ce fusil à pompe, il gagne +1 attaque jusqu'au début de son prochain tour. Non cumulable.

languages.text: 使用者がこのショットガンの遠距離{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}範囲攻撃{/g}で攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}する、または2体以上の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}すると、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始まで攻撃に+1が付与される。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がこのショットガンの遠距離範囲攻撃で攻撃を受け流しする、または2体以上の敵に攻撃すると、次のターンの開始まで攻撃に+1が付与される。この効果はスタックしない。
使用者がこのショットガンの遠距離範囲攻撃で攻撃を受け流しする、または2体以上の敵に攻撃すると、次のターンの開始まで攻撃に+1が付与される。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} oder 2 oder mehr Gegner mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampf{/g}-Flächenangriff dieser Schrotflinte {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhält er bis zum Beginn seiner nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} +1 Angriff. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger einen Angriff pariert oder 2 oder mehr Gegner mit dem Fernkampf-Flächenangriff dieser Schrotflinte trifft, erhält er bis zum Beginn seiner nächsten Runde +1 Angriff. Nicht stapelbar.

languages.text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку или попадает по 2 или более врагам выстрелом из этого дробовика по области, он может совершить +1 атаку дополнительно до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Не суммируется.
languages.original_text: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж парирует атаку или попадает по 2 или более врагам выстрелом из этого дробовика по области, он может совершить +1 атаку дополнительно до начала своего следующего хода. Не суммируется.
Когда персонаж парирует атаку или попадает по 2 или более врагам выстрелом из этого дробовика по области, он может совершить +1 атаку дополнительно до начала своего следующего хода. Не суммируется.
